#summary Steps for installation of reco-gnizr
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Introduction =
This file describes the steps to install reco-gnizr system. 
It also describes how to embed the reco-gnizr web-widget.

= Details =
=== The installation of reco-gnizr is pretty easy! ===
 * It involves setting up Tomcat (like servlet listener) server - version 6.x or above
 * Set up mySQL database - version[5.x]
 * Download and install the customized version of Gnizr from http://reco-gnizr.googlecode.com/files/rgnizr.jar
 * For installation, follow the instructions on Gnizr wiki page - http://code.google.com/p/gnizr/wiki/HowToInstall
 * Download the Reco-Gnizr sql script. http://reco-gnizr.googlecode.com/files/Reco-Gnizr.txt
 * Run the Reco-Gnizr DB Scripts
 * Download the web archieve file[reco-gnizr.war - http://reco-gnizr.googlecode.com/files/reco-gnizr.war]
 * Install the war, by just copying it in the "[Tomcat-home]/webapps/" folder
 * and that's it! start Tomcat server

=== Embedding the reco-gnizr web widget in the user web page: ===

Just copy the 'div' tag in the HTML source of the web page where the user wants to show bookmarks:


        <div>
        <script id="recognizrscript" type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost:8080/reco-gnizr/js/load-reco-gnizr.js#bgcolor=white&width=300px"></script>
        </div>

Add the above mentioned 'div' tag at the desired location.
